casebody.data:
Nick ESTERS, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Louis S. NELSON, Warden, San Quentin Prison, Defendants-Appellees. No. 26053. United States Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. Jan. 22, 1971. Nick Esters, in pro. per. Thomas C. Lynch, Cal. Atty. Gen., Deraid E. Granberg, Louise H. Renn, Deputy Attys. Gen., San Francisco, Cal., for appellees.

Before CHAMBERS, MERRILL and DUNIWAY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

The district court order denying habeas corpus relief is affirmed.

We find the petition for relief and the appeal legally frivolous.
